description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


This is a bugfix version.
- enable sni for tls client, so ws/wss can be reverse proxy by cloudflare/caddy. by @nanhantianyi in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/691
- fix panic because of parsing ipv6 address when doing hole punching. by @nanhantianyi in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/691
- fix ipv6 connector may bind to ipv4, leading to connect failure. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/696
- fix event log windows is too small on android devices . by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/696
Full Changelog: https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/compare/v2.2.3...v2.2.4
